name: Treasure Hunter of the Shimmering Woods

stage1.title: Treasure Hunter of the Shimmering Woods
stage1.description: Open a total of 100 treasure chests in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

stage2.title: Treasure Hunter of the Shimmering Woods
stage2.description: Open a total of 200 treasure chests in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

stage3.title: Treasure Hunter of the Shimmering Woods
stage3.description: Open a total of 400 treasure chests in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.
